mapper.update: UPDATE sd_order_assign set t.order_assign_id=#{orderAssignId}, t.order_id=#{orderId}, t.assign_user_id=#{assignUserId}, t.accept_user_name=#{acceptUserName}, t.is_look=#{isLook}, t.look_date=#{lookDate}, t.assign_type=#{assignType}, t.sd_id=#{sdId} where 1=1
mapper.select: SELECT t.order_assign_id, t.order_id, t.assign_user_id, t.accept_user_name, t.is_look, t.look_date, t.assign_type, t.sd_id FROM sd_order_assign t where 1 =1

SELECT t.order_assign_id, t.order_id, t.assign_user_id, t.accept_user_name, t.is_look, t.look_date, t.assign_type, t.sd_id FROM sd_order_assign t where 1 =1
AND accept_user_name=#{acceptUserName}
SELECT t.order_assign_id, t.order_id, t.assign_user_id, t.accept_user_name, t.is_look, t.look_date, t.assign_type, t.sd_id FROM sd_order_assign t LIMIT #{startRecod},#{pageSize}
SELECT t.order_assign_id, t.order_id, t.assign_user_id, t.accept_user_name, t.is_look, t.look_date, t.assign_type, t.sd_id FROM sd_order_assign t
mapper.insert: insert into sd_order_assign ( order_id, assign_user_id, accept_user_name, is_look, look_date, assign_type ) values ( #{orderId}, #{assignUserId}, #{acceptUserName}, #{isLook}, #{lookDate}, #{assignType} )

insert into sd_order_assign ( order_id, assign_user_id, accept_user_name, is_look, look_date, assign_type, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DEPART_ID, CREATE_DEPART_NAME ) values
( #{assign.orderId}, #{assign.assignUserId}, #{assign.acceptUserName}, #{assign.isLook}, #{assign.lookDate}, #{assign.assignType}, #{assign.createUserId}, #{assign.createUserName}, #{assign.createDepartId}, #{assign.createDepartName} )
